question: Show me the top 5 customers by loan balance

result.sql_query:
SELECT 
  c.CustomerID, 
  c.FirstName, 
  c.LastName, 
  SUM(soh.TotalDue) AS TotalSales
FROM Customer c
JOIN SalesOrderHeader soh ON c.CustomerID = soh.CustomerID
GROUP BY c.CustomerID
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;
result.explanation: AI-generated SQL using CLAUDE: 'Show me the top 5 customers by loan balance'
result.question: Show me the top 5 customers by loan balance
